thread.title: When Corporate Gobbledygook Is Good for Investors

author: Justin Lahart
title: When Corporate Gobbledygook Is Good for Investors
text:
When it comes to company securities filings, investors want clarity. When companies discuss taxes, investors should hope for the opposite. When investors want to dig into a company’s tax position, they know where to go: The tax footnote that appears in its annual report. But the Internal Revenue Service knows that is the place to […]
